content.title: Financial Assistance To Self-Employment For Trained Disabled Persons
content.department: Department of Social Justice & Special Assistance
content.details: The objective of this scheme is to provide financial assistance to facilitate the purchase of equipment for those disabled persons who are completing vocational training from government institutions or recognized institutions to start their own businesses.
benefits: Financial assistance for purchasing Tool Kits/Equipment
eligibility: Percentage of disability should be 40% and above
Orthopedically Handicapped Persons are also covered
Permanent residents of the state of Maharashtra are eligible
exclusions: Cannot reapply if already availed benefits
content.application_process: The entire application process is free of cost.
documents_required: Residential Certificate / Domicile Certificate of the State of Maharashtra

faqs.question: Is this a state funded or a centrally funded scheme?
faqs.answer: This is a 100% State Funded scheme.

faqs.question: Can applicants from neighboring states also apply to this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, only the citizens who are permanent residents of the state of Maharashtra are eligible to apply.
